reviews.review:
Absolutely wonderful game, I highly reccomend this game if you played the first portal.

It is more storyline based than the first game, and answers many questions that weren't answered at the end of the first game. Wonderful voice acting as well as characteristics bring the game to life.

The single player campaign alone should take anywhere from 5-7 hours for the average user, and after that you have co-op missions and DLC you can play to keep you busy.

One thing I will say though, DO NOT PLAY THIS IF YOU HAVEN'T PLAYED THE FIRST GAME. The experience isn't quite as amazing if you don't know some background about portal.
GLADoS will kill you if you don't play this game!
Thumbs up. Great puzzle game
Nunca me canso de jugar a este juego :D ¡Es genial!
Super et pas chere

Juegazo donde los haya. Divertido, con un humor demencial y unos puzzles ingeniosos sin llegar a ser abrumadores.

La primera parte fue una sorpresa para todos los jugadores y la gente sólo se quejaba de una cosa: era corta. Pues los de Valve tomaron buena nota y esta segunda parte te llevará un buen tiempo acabarla. A veces incluso llega a ser frustante la de ocasiones en las que piensas 'ah, vale, ya llega el final' y te encuentras de nuevo metido en el lío. Creo que los diseñadores han sabido trasladar perfectamente la paranoia implícita en las instalaciones de Aperture.

Vale cada euro que cuesta, es barato y suele estar en las ofertas. Ni te lo pienses. Yo lo he disfrutado al máximo y eso que todavía no he probado el modo colaborativo ni el contenido extra.
лучший ко-оп на двоих для тех кто не любит шутеры. просто шедевр, что и говорить

Valve really hit a home run when they improved on the already flawless formula of the original "Portal".  More puzzles, more dialogue, more characters, and more portals.  The added multiplayer is a fine touch to mess around in, but just based on the single player, I give this game a  (10/10).
Excellent jeu, beau, intélligent et drole
Шикарная)
Gute Story mit Humor und großartigen Rätseln. Muss man mal gespielt haben. 10/10

If you liked the first Portal game, this second game is a must buy. Although I strongly recomend to play first the previous game (is shorter, only two hours of gameplay), you can play this one and still understand its story, but you will miss a lot by not understanding the references to the first game.
Portal 2 is one of my favorite games of all time. Has a simple, however, clever story and gameplay. The characters especially GLaDOS and Wheatley are memorable. The second installment is a lot bigger than the first one and you have to add to all this a solid multiplayer. Portal 2 has a lot to offer: clever jokes and characters, fun and sometimes challenging gameplay, and good graphics. 10/10
АХУНО!!!!

I just re-installed this game and I'm still amazed at how much fun it is.  If you've never played Portal/Portal 2, I suggest buying it.  At less then $5, it is a true steal.  

Portal/Portal 2 offers challenging puzzles that make you think a biut.  The humor is done very well and made me laugh ot loud a few time....even through a second go at it.  The story stays consistant with its predecessor, yet offers some fresh twists.  

This game should easilly rank in the top 25 games of the past 10 to 20 years.
Классный сюжет,графика,замечательные проработанные персонажи.
Крутая игрушка!!!
хорошая логическая игра, в которую можно поиграть со своим другом

I'm really just reiterating what people have said preceding me, but they're right! Fantastic puzzles that are difficult without being utterly impossible, hilarious dialogue, lovely atmosphere and music, etc.
заебись, чётко

Excellent game! Valve somehow managed to improve the first Portal in every way, although it was almost perfect. Portal 2 has unparalleled humor, addictive gameplay and absolutely funny co-op with friends. Just grab both of them, they are brilliant and worth every penny!

This game's a blast in both single player and co-op.  It definitely makes you pause to think about some of the puzzles and tests part of the logic process usually not tapped into in gaming.  I loved it.
Muito bom!!!Melhor Jogo de Pc!!!
Such an awesome game! Great physics, good graphics, and a nice balance of puzzle/story.

Portal was one of the best games I had ever played. Portal 2 is more of the same plus added Stephen Merchant. An awesome, awesome experience.

100/100

This game is wonderful. It'll screw with your brain in ways you never thought possible, and when you solve a puzzle, you feel like an absolute genius. The characters breathe life into this game. Whether being called a "smelly piece of trash that sits around doing nothing" by GLaDOS, or being punched into a pit by everyone's favorite moron, or being told to play it cool because "here come the space cops", I always felt completely immersed in this game. I never made it through the original, but now that I've gotten the hang of this, I really need to go back and play it. And I'll admit, I NEVER looked up how to solve the tests, but I did need a little help navigating between tests in the second stage of the game. Although I have yet to try co-op, I hear it's wonderful. If you're the type of person who likes a challenge, or is just looking to hear some hilarious dialogue, Portal 2 was tailor-made for you.
Hervorragendes Spiel
Super coop hra :)
Ein sehr gutes Spiel, dass seinen Ansprüchen entspricht. Man kann es garnicht richtig beschreiben, sondern muss es erst selbst einmal gespiel haben.

[b]Gameplay, Graphics, Storyline, it's all here. Bundled by Valve into a game named Portal 2.[/b]

Being the sequel to [url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/400/]Portal[/url], this game had a high bar set, and it reached it so many metres higher. The graphics, when set to full, provide an emmersive enviroment of which is intantly recognisible and different to the norm of 'shooty shooty everythings falling apart shooty everyone maps'. The storyline of Portal 2 is the reason I played it fully through. Completing Portal 2 is an immensly satisfying experience, and I suggest working through those hard puzzles just to be able to witness the amazing Portal 2 narrative (There's more emotion than a full pilot ofCorination Street, not that I watch the show). When it comes to Gameplay, Valve have worked really hard on bringing you new puzzles of which you will experience the feelings such as ("Wait, how did I just do that, oh well it worked, lets move on" to "Aghgjdfhghg... Oh that's it").

[i]So highly recomended that my recommendation is somewhere on the moon. ;)[/i]
[b]10/10[/b]

Assolutamente stupendo,grafica mozzafiato,storia intrigata e ben costruita e molto divertente anche per quanto riguarda i discorsi.
L'ho comprato da poco e dico solo che sono stato due ore a giocare non rendendomi conto che il tempo passava,mi ha catturato.
Cosa che ritengo molto interessessante è anche quella di poter usare la voce per interragire nel gioco,oltre naturlamente alla modalità multiplayer...
Insomma,un acquisto di cui ne vale la pena.

this game was alot of fun as it involved alot of thinking which is one of my strong points but aside from that i also loved the game because you never knew what was coming next and there was alot of cool ways to complete the levels and after a while it became that you didnt have complete levels as such but smaller puzzles on the side of the game 

overall it was fun and cool
В Portal 2 вы откроете для себя инновационный геймплей, сюжет и музыку, которая помогла оригиналу заработать более 70 наград в игровой индустрии, а также создала целый культ имени самой себя.
dobra gra:)

Portal 2 é um jogo de puzzle na primeira pessoa. O jogo todo consiste em atravessar puzzles mas apenas com uma arma, a arma de portais (ou Portal gun). Ela te permite lançar portais, um azul e outro laranja. Com eles você conseguirá passar de todos os puzzles. O jogo é uma continuação de Portal (jogue-o então) trazendo todos os personagens do primeiro e acrescentando mais tempo de gameplay e uma história mais profunda.
Best puzzler ever and greatest valve game!

Один из шедевров Valve.Скажу одно, приобретайте смело,так как об этой игре можно много рассказывать,но она всегда будет открывать,что то новое ддля каждого игрока.
Excellent follow up to the original.

With portal 2 being the epic conclusion of portal 1, it succeeded greatly with keeping a good story that brought both emotion, but still managed to use the portal puzzles that we love within limits. 

With a new story means new objectives, in portal 2 there are many features that will surely keep me and other players playing for hours, for example in the second edition of portal they have added new puzzle mechanics, co-op features for playing with friends etc.., and lastly even map designing which I am still looking forward to trying.

I highly recommend this game to any who has either played the first portal game or is wanting to start into the series.

My overall rating from mainly the campaign is....
